comment:
* Implement the Ethiopic calendar system. *

* EthiopicCalendar usually should be instantiated using * {@link android.icu.util.Calendar#getInstance(ULocale)} passing in a ULocale * with the tag "@calendar=ethiopic".

* * @see android.icu.util.Calendar

variables.name: MESKEREM
variables.comment: * Constant for መስከረም, the 1st month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: TEKEMT
variables.comment: * Constant for ጥቅምት, the 2nd month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: HEDAR
variables.comment: * Constant for ኅዳር, the 3rd month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: TAHSAS
variables.comment: * Constant for ታኅሣሥ, the 4th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: TER
variables.comment: * Constant for ጥር, the 5th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: YEKATIT
variables.comment: * Constant for የካቲት, the 6th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: MEGABIT
variables.comment: * Constant for መጋቢት, the 7th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: MIAZIA
variables.comment: * Constant for ሚያዝያ, the 8th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: GENBOT
variables.comment: * Constant for ግንቦት, the 9th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: SENE
variables.comment: * Constant for ሰኔ, the 10th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: HAMLE
variables.comment: * Constant for ሐምሌ, the 11th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: NEHASSE
variables.comment: * Constant for ነሐሴ, the 12th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: PAGUMEN
variables.comment: * Constant for ጳጉሜን, the 13th month of the Ethiopic year.

variables.name: AMETE_MIHRET_ERA
variables.comment: Amete Mihret won't be used for the ERA field.

methods.name: public void setAmeteAlemEra(boolean onOff)
methods.comment:
* Set Alem or Mihret era.
     *
     * @param onOff Set Amete Alem era if true, otherwise set Amete Mihret era.

methods.name: public boolean isAmeteAlemEra()
methods.comment:
* Return true if this calendar is set to the Amete Alem era.
     *
     * @return true if set to the Amete Alem era.

methods.name: protected int handleGetExtendedYear()
protected void handleComputeFields(int julianDay)
protected int handleGetLimit(int field, int limitType)
protected int getJDEpochOffset()
public static int EthiopicToJD(long year, int month, int date)

methodNames: protected int handleGetLimit(int field, int limitType)
public static int EthiopicToJD(long year, int month, int date)
